data.question: What is the empirical formula of AgMOC?
What is the Tafel slope for CuCP in HER activity?
Does the synthesis of CuCP involve the use of ammonium thiocyanate?
What method was used to record the FT-IR spectra of HL and the synthetic compounds?
What is the BET surface area of AgMOC?
Is the electrochemical stability of AgMOC higher than CuCP in HER activity?
What is the ideality factor (Î·) for the device fabricated with AgMOC?
What type of geometry does each of the copper(II) centres in CuCP exhibit?
Does the synthesis of AgMOC involve heating under reflux with 1,3-diaminopropan-2-ol?
What is the turnover frequency (TOF) per-site for AgMOC in hydrogen production?
What is the role of ammonium thiocyanate in the synthesis of CuCP?
data.answer: It is added to the reaction mixture of Cu(OAc)2 and HL to form CuCP.

data.question: Is the electrical conductivity of AgMOC higher than that of CuCP?
What is the overpotential of AgMOC at the current density of 10 mA cm-2?
What is the significance of the Tafel slope in evaluating HER activity?
data.answer: The Tafel slope helps in understanding the kinetics of the hydrogen evolution reaction.

data.question: Does the synthesis of AgMOC result in a porous structure?
What is the role of BET analysis in the characterization of AgMOC and CuCP?
data.answer: BET analysis is used to determine the surface area of AgMOC and CuCP.

data.question: What is the effect of the porous structure of AgMOC on its electrocatalytic activity?
data.answer: The porous structure of AgMOC leads to a higher rate of electron transport and facilitates the catalytic electrochemical production of molecular hydrogen.

data.question: Is the crystallinity of AgMOC and CuCP maintained after electrocatalytic hydrogen evolution?
What analytical technique was used to determine the morphology of AgMOC and CuCP?
How does the electrical transport property of AgMOC compare to that of CuCP?
data.answer: AgMOC exhibits superior electrical transport properties compared to CuCP.
